title: Functional Testing - Taylor
description: Path to Health Functional Testing REQUEST INFORMATION SHOP NOW PATIENT PORTAL The functional medicine model is an individualized, patient-centered, science-based approach that empowers patients and practitioners to work together to address the underlying causes of disease and promote optimal wellness.
